subtitle_hr: Kompletna telekomunikacijska riješenja za Vaše poslovanje
subtitle_en: Complete telecommunication solutions for your business
b2b_description_hr: Specijalizirani smo za prodaju telekomunikacijskih usluga tvrtkama. Nudimo mobilne tarife prilagođene poslovnim potrebama, širok izbor mobilnih uređaja i internet pakete koji osiguravaju kontinuiranu komunikaciju i produktivnost Vaše tvrtke.
b2b_description_en: We specialize in selling telecommunication services to companies. We offer mobile plans tailored to business needs, a wide selection of mobile devices, and internet packages that ensure continuous communication and productivity for your business.
service_description_hr: Kompletan spektar usluga održavanja i zaštite Vaših mobilnih uređaja i laptopa. Od stručnog servisa i zamjene dijelova do fleksibilnog osiguranja, osiguravamo dugotrajnost i zaštitu Vaše opreme.
service_description_en: Complete range of maintenance and protection services for your mobile devices and laptops. From expert service and parts replacement to flexible insurance, we ensure durability and protection of your equipment.
